about_the_game:
In a world full of challenges and dangers, aliens have invaded Earth, setting up various obstacles on the roads of cities, disrupting human life. To save the planet, players need to control two cars, using flexible operations and quick reactions to avoid the constantly appearing obstacles and aliens, successfully reaching the finish line. Each level has different difficulties and unique obstacle designs, testing players' driving skills and strategic thinking.

Players control the two cars using the “A” and “D” keys (or the left and right arrow keys) on their keyboard. The left car and the right car correspond to different control keys. Players must adjust the trajectories of both cars according to the road conditions and the positions of obstacles, dodging collisions in a timely manner. The game features multiple levels, each with creative designs, varying types and quantities of obstacles, and some levels even include alien attacks for added challenge.

A key/Left Arrow Key: Move the left car left

D key/Right Arrow Key: Move the right car right

Avoid Obstacles: Pay attention to the obstacles ahead and control both cars to avoid collisions

The game includes multiple diverse levels, each with unique obstacles and challenges. For example:

Easy-to-learn Controls: Just use the “A” and “D” keys (or left and right arrow keys), making it accessible for players of all ages.

Diverse Level Designs: Each level features different visual styles and difficulties, ensuring players never get bored.

Exciting Gameplay Experience: As levels progress, the speed and difficulty increase, providing endless challenges.

Collectible Power-ups: Collect various items in the game to help you deal with obstacles more easily.

Obstacle Sprint is a racing game that combines speed, skill, and strategy, suitable for all players who enjoy challenges. Through precise control and quick reactions, players will experience the thrill and fun of dodging obstacles. Are you ready to take on the challenge? Join this escape journey and save the Earth!

name: Obstacle Sprint

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/10/11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx1050
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/10/11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx3060
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
